pr_title: ISPN-11678 IndexModificationStrategy removal + ISPN-11712 Indexing auto-enabling based on <indexing> presence

timeline.bodyText: It still need to read somehow the configured Index, since it is deprecated, not removed. Index.PRIMARY_OWNER should probably throw an exception since it is not a safe option for non-shared indexes,and we removed all shared index managers.  When configured, Index.NONE and Index.ALL should be respected over the automatic detection
timeline.author: gustavonalle

replies.bodyText:
It still need to read somehow the configured Index, since it is deprecated, not removed. yes, I've commented about that -> #8204 (comment)
replies.author: anistor

replies.bodyText:
I still insist on respecting the config:

Index.NONE -> don't index, log deprecated WARN
Index.PRIMARY_OWNER -> throw error
Index.ALL -> do nothing, log deprecated WARN
replies.author: gustavonalle

replies.bodyText: I'd be also OK with changing the current deprecation WARN logs to mention:  "Index" config is deprecated and ignored, please check the upgrade guide
replies.author: gustavonalle

replies.bodyText: I'm perfectly fine respecting the config, but your "ISPN-11241 Deprecate Indexing mode"  basically obliterated that, and was not sure if it was a mistake or intentional :) And the later removals made it worse, turning some code into dead code. So we need to put something back there.
replies.author: anistor

replies.bodyText: It was my mistake. So why don't we settle for this PR + enriching the WARN that those config are ignored?
replies.author: gustavonalle

replies.bodyText: I've done this, in first and second commit. And added several more commits that are ISPN-11241 floow-up
replies.author: anistor

ISPN-11678 IndexModificationStrategy has become a degenerated enum after all the recent removals and can be removed entirely

* there are only two strategies left: ALL, MANUAL

ISPN-11678 Remove IndexModificationStrategy

* the behaviour of MANUAL/ALL can be moved to QueryInteceptor
* also remove unused method ComponentRegistryUtils.getIndexInspector (we should always use @Inject if possible)

Validation for local indexing no longer needed in AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder

* this configuration case is not longer possible
ISPN-11715 Indexing autoConfig should not override the manual activation/deactivation of indexing

ISPN-11716 Setting the legacy index mode should not override the manual activation/deactivation of indexing

* these two must be mutually exclusive and an exception should be thrown
* remove unused IndexingConfigurationBuilder.index() package-local getter

ISPN-11712 Indexing should be enabled by default if the <indexing> element is present and the "enabled" attribute is missing

* this cannot be fixed trivially by changing the xsd default
ISPN-11712 Remove explicit indexing enabled="true" from xml configs
